Trigger.Name: Variables
Trigger.Description:
################################################# ${_screenwidth} = 2560
${_screenheight} = 1390 ################################################# ${var:width} = 500
${var:height} = 150
${var:opacity} = 100 ################################################# ${var:Xright} ${_screenwidth} - 660 = 1900 ${var:Xmid} ${_screenwidth} - 1560 = 1000 ################################################# ${var:Yone} ${_screenheight} - 790 = 600 ${var:Ytwo} ${_screenheight} - 740 = 650 ${var:Ythree} ${_screenheight} - 690 = 700 ${var:Yfour} ${_screenheight} - 640 = 750 ${var:Yfive} ${_screenheight} - 590 = 800 ${var:Ysix} ${_screenheight} - 540 = 850 ${var:Yseven} ${_screenheight} - 490 = 900 ##################################################
1900
600(Yone) - 650(Ytwo) - 700(Ythree) - 750(Yfour) - 800(Yfive) - 850(Ysix) - 900(Yseven)
450
150
100
##################################################
Yone Swiftcast is ready
Ytwo MP is ready (Lucid Dreaming)
Ythree Shield is ready(whm, ast) | Aetherflow is ready(sch, smn) | Next song is ready(brd) | Dance is ready(dnc) | Bomb is ready(mch) | Trick Attack is ready(nin)
Yfour Buff is ready
Yfive Refresh dots
Ysix ALL AREAS TRIGGERS
Yseven DUNGEON TRIGGERS
##################################################

Trigger.Name: Party Leader
Trigger.RegularExpression: (You are promoted to party leader.*|has promoted you to party leader.*)

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: You are now the party leader

Action.TextAuraExpression: You are now the party leader

Trigger.Name: Wake Up
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:0039:(?<time>[0-9]) minutes have elapsed since your last activity

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: Wake up. Wake the fuck up

Trigger.Name: Deactivate everything
Trigger.RegularExpression: (has ended|You have left the sanctuary|01:Changed Zone|0839:You change to)

Trigger.Name: Objective accomplished
Trigger.RegularExpression: Objective accomplished. If applicable, please make sure to submit items within the time limit

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: Objective accomplished. Delivery your items now.

Trigger.Name: Deactivate all triggers (except ast cards)
Trigger.RegularExpression: (You have joined the critical engagement|Your item level has been synced to|You gain [^|]* mettle|is no longer sealed!)

Trigger.Name: Critical Engagement
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^|]*\|0039\|[^|]*\|Resistance forces have initiated a critical engagement nearby
